com.venomvendor.sdk.wordpress.network.connections.request

Class NetworkHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.venomvendor.sdk.wordpress.network.connections.request.NetworkHandler

  • public class NetworkHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all network operations

    • Method Summary

      Get Instance of current network operation

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ListenerHandler getInstance(java.lang.String identifier)
        Get Instance of current network operation

        Ex: To Get RecentPosts

             PostRequests req = (PostRequests) NetworkHandler.getInstance(PostRequests.IDENTIFIER);
     req.getRecentPosts(new ResponseHandler<GetPost[]>() {
          @Override
         public void onResponse(Response<GetPost[]> response, WordpressException ex) {
             if (response != null) {
                 // handle response
             } else {
                 Log.d(TAG, ex.getMessage());
             }
         });
     });
        Parameters:
        identifier - must be one of Requests
        Returns:
        Instance of ListenerHandler if available else throws WordpressException
